mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM SET ITEMID = #{itemId}, PRODUCTID = #{productId}, LISTPRICE = #{listPrice}, UNITCOST = #{unitCost}, ATTR1 = #{attribute1}, CLOSINGTIME = #{closingTime}, DEPOSIT = #{deposit} WHERE ITEMID = #{itemId}
